verses.verse: A Prayer of David. Bow <S%H5186>down<s%> thine <S%H241>ear<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H6030>answer<s%> <S%H6041>me<s%>; For I am poor and <S%H34>needy<s%>.
Preserve <S%H8104><s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>; For I am <S%H2623>godly<s%>: O thou my <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H3467>save<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> that trusteth in <S%H982>thee<s%>.
Be <S%H2603>merciful<s%> unto <S%H136>me<s%>, O Lord; For unto thee do I <S%H7121>cry<s%> all the day <S%H3117>long<s%>.
Rejoice <S%H8055><s%> the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>; For unto <S%H136>thee<s%>, O Lord, do I lift <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
For <S%H136>thou<s%>, Lord, art <S%H2896>good<s%>, and ready to <S%H5546>forgive<s%>, And <S%H7227>abundant<s%> in <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> unto all them that call upon <S%H7121>thee<s%>.
Give <S%H238>ear<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, unto my <S%H8605>prayer<s%>; And <S%H7181>hearken<s%> unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H8469>supplications<s%>.
In the <S%H3117>day<s%> of my <S%H6869>trouble<s%> I will <S%H7121>call<s%> upon <S%H6030>thee<s%>; For thou wilt answer me.
There is none like unto thee among the <S%H430>gods<s%>, O <S%H136>Lord<s%>; Neither are there any works like unto thy <S%H4639>works<s%>.

All <S%H1471>nations<s%> whom thou hast <S%H6213>made<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H136>thee<s%>, O Lord; And they shall <S%H3513>glorify<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%>.
For thou art <S%H1419>great<s%>, and <S%H6213>doest<s%> wondrous <S%H6381>things<s%>: Thou art God <S%H430>alone<s%>.

Teach <S%H3384><s%> me thy <S%H1870>way<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; I will <S%H1980>walk<s%> in thy <S%H571>truth<s%>: <S%H3161>Unite<s%> my <S%H3824>heart<s%> to <S%H3372>fear<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%>.
I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H136>thee<s%>, O Lord my <S%H430>God<s%>, with my whole <S%H3824>heart<s%>; And I will <S%H3513>glorify<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%> for <S%H5769>evermore<s%>.
For <S%H1419>great<s%> is thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> toward <S%H5337>me<s%>; And thou hast delivered my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H8482>lowest<s%> <S%H7585>Sheol<s%>.

O <S%H430>God<s%>, the <S%H2086>proud<s%> are <S%H6965>risen<s%> up against <S%H5712>me<s%>, And a company of <S%H6184>violent<s%> men have <S%H1245>sought<s%> after my <S%H5315>soul<s%>, And have not set thee before <S%H7760>them<s%>.

But <S%H136>thou<s%>, O Lord, art a <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7349>merciful<s%> and <S%H2587>gracious<s%>, <S%H750>Slow<s%> to <S%H7227>anger<s%>, and abundant in <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%>.

Oh <S%H6437>turn<s%> unto <S%H2603>me<s%>, and have mercy upon <S%H5414>me<s%>; Give thy <S%H5797>strength<s%> unto thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>, And <S%H3467>save<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of thy <S%H519>handmaid<s%>.

Show <S%H6213><s%> me a <S%H226>token<s%> for <S%H2896>good<s%>, That they who <S%H8130>hate<s%> me may <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H954>it<s%>, and be put to shame, Because <S%H3068>thou<s%>, Jehovah, hast <S%H5826>helped<s%> <S%H5162>me<s%>, and comforted me.
